g:HTMLPanel.div: LOVE Its staff or external adults should provide the sense of care as a parent would do with their own children. The children should feel every day that they can count on someone that spend part of their time with them. It provides the love to overcome the impact of not having their parents close and a reference for them to be able to love others. It should supply staff or external people and should train care givers to overcome the extensive work of the shelter in order to provide enough love to the children.
